entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
